::Zardus::

"There are over forty bots occupying the two bases on this island," 
Zardus says, entering the Iron Fist and taking a turn. "They're mainly 
warriors, but we have scientists as well. Security is a neccessity 
with the amount of bots on the planet."

He stops at a console, gesturing toward it. "Any information about the 
planet would be available from this console. What exactly do you need 
to know?"

Of course, the console wouldn't have information like the project that 
Lady Hawk was working on, or the repair station being built, but it 
had most everything that the Alliance knew about the other factions, 
which, in the case of the factions that had been around for some time, 
was quite alot.
